org.apache.ignite.ml.trees.trainers.columnbased

Class TrainingContext<D extends ContinuousRegionInfo>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.trees.trainers.columnbased.TrainingContext<D>
  • Type Parameters:
    D - Class for storing of information used in calculation of impurity of continuous feature region.

    public class TrainingContext<D extends ContinuousRegionInfo>
extends Object
    Context of training with ColumnDecisionTreeTrainer.

        Construct context for training with ColumnDecisionTreeTrainer.
        Parameters:
        input - Input for training.
        continuousSplitCalculator - Calculator used for calculations of splits of continuous features regions.
        categoricalSplitCalculator - Calculator used for calculations of splits of categorical features regions.
        trainingUUID - UUID of the current training.
        ignite - Ignite instance.

      • performSplit

        public IgniteBiTuple<RegionProjection,RegionProjection> performSplit(ColumnDecisionTreeTrainerInput input,
                                                                     com.zaxxer.sparsebits.SparseBitSet bitSet,
                                                                     int targetFeatIdx,
                                                                     int bestFeatIdx,
                                                                     RegionProjection targetRegionPrj,
                                                                     RegionInfo leftData,
                                                                     RegionInfo rightData,
                                                                     Ignite ignite)
        Perform best split on the given region projection.
        Parameters:
        input - Input of ColumnDecisionTreeTrainer performing split.
        bitSet - Bit set specifying split.
        targetFeatIdx - Index of feature for performing split.
        bestFeatIdx - Index of feature with best split.
        targetRegionPrj - Projection of region to split on feature with index featureIdx.
        leftData - Data of left region of split.
        rightData - Data of right region of split.
        ignite - Ignite instance.
        Returns:
        Perform best split on the given region projection.
